channel.title: Weapon problems
channel.description: im tryign to add custom bows and it worked but it equips as gloves how do i fix this

item.title: Weapon problems
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

Delta assigns equipment as weapons by default. If they’re equipping to the gloves slot without you having explicitly made them, you need to remove their IDs from the gloves array in, like Skiire said, the Item class.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon problems
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

forgotmename:

itselta and what is the file i do thsi to

Item class for delta.

Check around in there, I vaguely remember there being arrays for items to equip in the right slots.

Look for something like

public static int weapons[]

Add your bows id in there, rather then doing the switch statement as I had previously stated.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapon problems
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Go to the class designated for equipping weaponry/armor and tell the server that if the item ID is equal to your custom bow’s Id then it should equip to the specified area. (You didn’t tell us the revision nor the source you’re using so I can’t help you more than that)

switch(methodForEquippingItems) {
case IdForBow:
targetSlot = 0;//for weapons
break;
}

Ignore conventions, I typed this in the reply box. Also depending on your source you may have to change targetSlot, that’s in PI.

Read full topic
